title.narrative: Youth-led accountability of the Sustainable Development Goals: The Reality of Youth Power

description.narrative: The objective of the development cooperation among the parties is to help embed youth-led accountability in the heart of the 2030 Agenda in order to catalyse the achievement of the SDGs.

title.narrative: Young people’s involvement in VNR and other review and accountability processes related to the 2030 Agenda

description.narrative:
One training event for youth activists, one HLPF event focused on the role of youth monitoring the SDGs with continued support to youth activists after HLPF, and one UNGA event focused on how young people are achieving and monitoring SDGs 5 on gender equality.
Output indicator 1: A two-day training seminar attended by a diversity of young people is held where key knowledge and expertise is shared on how best to engage in the HLPF processes and influence SDG implementation and monitoring at the national level Output indicator 2: Delivery of a successful high level event which demonstrates and showcases the leading role of youth in development to UN member states and provides concrete examples on how governments and UN Institutions can practically engage youth, in all their diversity, within SDG implementation, monitoring and review processes. Output indicator 3: Instruments are developed and used, network of young people developed and supported
